source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Security Awareness Training

visible_instructors.name: Michael
visible_instructors.job_title: Computer Science Professor, PhD, MSc, CISSP
visible_instructors.title: Michael Biocchi

items.headline: A basic guide to staying safe online and to introduce new knowledge to people about internet security and privacy.
objectives_summary: Discover new knowledge about online security and privacy!
Determine if your password is secure enough and learn an easy method to creating long passwords that are easy to remember!
Spot the differences between a real email and a scam email!

items.title: Unconscious Bias: Fuel Diversity and Become a Better You

visible_instructors.job_title: Recruiting, Bias, Diversity, Leadership, Corporate Culture,
visible_instructors.name: Gail
visible_instructors.title: Gail Miller

items.headline: Defeat unconscious bias and build diversity and inclusion into your life even if it seems impossible right now!
objectives_summary: Why our brains make the mental shortcuts that become our unconscious biases
Several sneaky unconscious biases that wreak havoc on every decision in life
A powerful way to grow your self awareness to reveal your hidden biases

items.title: Conflict Management with Emotional Intelligence
items.headline: Discover ways to grow your communication skills to manage conflict and develop emotional intelligence in the workplace
objectives_summary: Recognize why some conflict is to be expected and why it is a part of healthy relationships.
Compare and contrast the various modes that can be used in conflict resolution.
Assess your own mode of conflict and how this helps or hinders you in working with conflict.

items.title: Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion: A Beginner’s Guide
items.headline: Practical strategies for developing your company's global Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion function
objectives_summary: Define diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging
Understand the business case for creating a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workplace
Master the skills to champion inclusion such as becoming aware of your biases and active listening

items.title: Developing Emotional Intelligence in Teams
items.headline: Discover better team working through winning the hearts and minds and developing emotional intelligence in the workplace
objectives_summary: Identify how team working through emotional intelligence can lead to better outcomes
Explore how people can behave and react to change and the emotions experienced in change
Recognize why some conflict is to be expected and why it is a part of healthy relationships

items.title: Navigate Diversity
items.headline: Diversity enriches the workplace, as long as everyone is respectful. Assert yourself & leverage diversity on your team.
objectives_summary: Learn from diversity
Say & do the right things
Stand up for yourself & others

items.title: Administrative Human Resources (HR) for Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning

items.headline: This course is an introduction to the role and duties of Human Resources (HR).
objectives_summary: Explore the role of human resources (HR) from administrative and compliance to strategy and business growth.
Discover where to begin with a HR audit.
Discover the process of recruiting great talent, from job analysis to writing interview questions and job postings.

items.title: Understanding and Complying with HIPAA
items.headline: This program will train you on the HIPAA and provide an overview on the rules governing protected health information.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will have an fundamental understanding of HIPAA.

items.title: Manage Workplace Stress & Strike a Balance
items.headline: Our lives can be filled with daily stressors. Learn to manage stress and strike a better balance in your life.
objectives_summary: Learn the physiology of stress
Practice ways to manage that stress & relax
Understand how to strike a better work-life balance & get things done

items.title: World-Class HR: 21st Century Talent Management
items.headline: Learn about the challenges and opportunities of modern human resources (HR). Attract and retain the best people.
objectives_summary: Rapidly move talent from early leadership to senior leadership
Retain and engage your top talent
Create more collaboration and knowledge sharing across your company

items.title: [2021] Recruiting: Talent Acquisition & Hiring (Version 3)

visible_instructors.name: Eazl
visible_instructors.job_title: The Online School that Fits Your Life
visible_instructors.title: Eazl (Official)

visible_instructors.name: Ludell
visible_instructors.job_title: COO of Eazl, Winner of Udemy Innovation Award
visible_instructors.title: Ludell Jones

items.headline: Be able to hire great people! Learn recruitment in a bestselling recruiting course used by IBM®, eBay®, Lyft® & others.
objectives_summary: Define an ideal candidate profile that includes skills and issues related to culture fit
Write a job description that attracts candidates
Attract high-quality candidates through referral recruiting and, in some cases, by maintaining a passive candidate stroke file

items.title: Interview Questions: Interview Like a Professional HRM
items.headline: A Quick Guide for Owners and Managers of Small Businesses
objectives_summary: Formulate interview questions to identify key attributes that hiring managers seek in job applicants.
Apply the 3 goals and 3 basic types of interview questions.
Pose effective questions to differentiate between experience and expertise in candidates.

items.title: Diversity & Inclusion: Building a Grassroots Foundation
items.headline: Practical strategies for building an organizational culture of diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging
objectives_summary: Familiarize yourself with key terms in the Diversity & Inclusion (D&I) space
Understand the business case for D&I and who is responsible for it in an organization (hint: it's not just HR!)
Build an understanding of D&I in your organization by using the Advocate's Journey Framework – to meet people where they are and move them forward

items.title: Instructional Design for ELearning

visible_instructors.name: Marina
visible_instructors.job_title: Senior ELearning Specialist and Instructional Designer
visible_instructors.title: Marina Arshavskiy

items.headline: Designing Successful ELearning Courses. Learn from a multi-award-winning instructional designer
objectives_summary: Define the terms instructional design, eLearning, and blended learning
Describe the difference between computer-based training and web-based training
Identify and describe advantages and disadvantages of synchronous and asynchronous eLearning

items.title: Learn HR Fundamentals for a Career in Human Resources

visible_instructors.job_title: Certified Sr Professional in Human Resources
visible_instructors.name: Christina A.
visible_instructors.title: Christina A. Danforth

items.headline: Human Resource Management is key to developing any business or organization. Learn core HR roles and responsibilities.
objectives_summary: Develop a general understanding of the Human Resources function.
Apply key HR concepts and principles in the workplace.

items.title: Understanding Unconscious Bias
items.headline: How to eliminate prejudice in your organisation and create a fair and inclusive working environment
objectives_summary: Understand why humans are biased and are naturally built to stereotype
Appreciate the relationship between bias and stereotypes, prejudice and discrimination
Assess the impact of bias on their decision-making, behaviour and relationships
